name: Omastar
author: Masakazu Fukuda
flavor_text: It is thought that this Pokémon became extinct because its spiral shell grew too large.

poke_power.name: Primal Swirl
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn, when you play Omastar from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may remove the highest Stage Evolution card from each of your opponent’s Benched Evolved Pokémon and put those cards back into his or her hand. You can’t use more than 1 Primal Swirl Poké-Power each turn.

attacks.name: Send Back
attacks.effect: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.
